rationale: The segment reports efforts to confirm the safety of products following virus detection in cattle herds without using intensifiers or comparatives modifying risk adjectives.
statement_text: Federal authorities have been working to confirm the safety of milk and meat products following the detection of the H5N1 virus in 34 dairy cattle herds across nine states since the end of March.
